settings.body_text: You’ll get the fastest relief by taking this directly under the tongue and then swallowing. But here are some other ways we like to use it:

settings.list_text: Take 4 full droppers (½ tsp) 15 minutes before intimacy.
Take directly in mouth or under tongue (and then swallow).
If preferred, add to water, tea or other beverage.

settings.title: What's a tincture?
settings.summary: Tinctures are highly concentrated herbal formulas in liquid form. You can drink or "dropper" them directly into your mouth to get the benefits of the active ingredients even faster than a capsule, gummy or candle as they do not need to be broken down in your stomach. They go directly into your system, particularly if you squirt them under your tongue.

settings.title: Can I use Libido Tincture every day?
settings.summary: Yes. Our formulas are made up of all natural ingredients and can be used for daily support.

settings.title: Can I use Libido Tincture with other supplements or medications?
settings.summary: Our products are all-natural and can be used in conjunction with other Wile products. Please speak to your primary physician before taking Burnout Relief Tincture with other medications.

settings.title: How do I use Libido Tincture?
settings.summary: This is an herbal tincture with a dropper inside. Use a 2-4 full droppers directly into your mouth, under your tongue and then swallow. You can also pour the tincture into a spoon - the dosage is equivalent to 0.5 teaspoon. Some people prefer to add the tincture to water or tea.

settings.title: Can I use Libido Tincture with the other products or tinctures?
settings.summary: Absolutely. Our product line is designed to mix and match. You can take more than 1 type of tincture in the same day, or pair it with our capsules or drinks.

settings.title: Are there clinical studies supporting Burnout Relief Tincture?
settings.summary:
Ingredient studies include:

double-blind, placebo-controlled trial

2008;14(6):707-713.

2014;151(1):528-535.

review of randomized clinical trials
The effectiveness and efficacy of Rhodiola rosea L.: a systematic review of randomized clinical trials.

Lopresti AL, Smith SJ, Malvi H, Kodgule R. An investigation into the stress-relieving and pharmacological actions of an ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) extract: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study. Medicine (Baltimore).

2019;98(37):e17186.

settings.title: Does Libido Tincture contain any stimulants?
settings.summary: There is no added caffeine, taurine or other stimulants in this product.

settings.title: Does Libido Tincture contain CBD?
settings.summary: There is no CBD in this formula.

settings.title: Does Libido Tincture help low sex drive in women?
settings.summary: We designed Libido to address both sides of female arousal. It mitigates the mental stress and distracted thoughts that often block our arousal and can impact our hormones, too. And it boosts physical arousal, desire and sensation to keep you present in your body and combat the lowered response that can occur during and after perimenopause.
